trends: There have been no other sightings in Huizen
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 2 times 3 triangles in triangulare formation ore two trianglare shapes with on the point triangles and in the middle transparant. soft red glowing "bellies".
divs: sighting detailscoming from starsyne dragon going to starsyne ram. seen trough the roofwindow of my bathroom. flying in a very, very slight downward angled line and moving a tiny but away from each other. we are close to airport schiphol\amsterdam. i know the way how airplanes look in all sorts, scapes and formes, by night and by day and at any flybyhight. normaly i feel the planes before, during and after they pass our house via the ground ( i am very highly sensitive ). i could not feel this objects in any way. there was no sound. i was practising the starsynes with my adjustible starchart, with the light in the bathroom out, and just an lichttorch at hand, wich was turned of at the moment of flyby. if there had been any form of light at the moment of flyby, i would absolutely not have seen them. they were dark from form but very sharp visible against the sky, with softglowing darkred bellies (only in the middle). it were two formations made of three triangles - ore - two triangles with transparant body and visible traingles on the points. the points of the triangles were in the flightdirection (say ruffly to the south). it was a realy clear night (that was wy i could practice my starsynes), with the background (the black of the nightsky) very darkblue glowing. the flyby time was close to one second. the flyhight of the objects i could not tell, because i don't know how big they were. when i would have drawn the formations on the window like i saw them, and would mesure them, i would think about 8 centimeters from farest point to farest point. all the triangleforms were all sides the same lenght. whem i saw them, i felt a great joy inside. they were beautiful, and very clear. i have seen ufo's earlyer in my live (a few months before the ufo sightings over belgium, were the airforce of belgium reacted on), and i was pleasantly surprised, that i saw ufo's again. those were big lightsin triangle formation. the ufo's i saw now, in 2007, could have been the same, but with the lights very low glowing. the day after i contacted schiphol, but they don't do anything with it. maybe i had the wrong person on the telephone. i know the date very well, because it was the night after my fathers birthday (who died that year) and the birthday of my "daughter in law" (13th and 14th of november), and the time, because i had a clock near me, for ajusting the starsyne-chart to the right time.
